text: ōrēā samudāyattiluṁ avarkketirāyi nilakeāḷḷunna sākṣiye avaril ninnu tanne nāṁ niyēāgikkunna divasamāṇat. ikkūṭṭarkketire sākṣiyāyi ninne nāṁ keāṇṭuvarunnatumāṇ. ninakk nāṁ ī vēdapustakaṁ iṟakkittannirikkunnu. itil sakala saṅgatikaḷkkumuḷḷa viśadīkaraṇamuṇṭ. vaḻippeṭṭu jīvikkunnavarkk vaḻikāṭṭiyuṁ anugrahavuṁ śubhavr̥ttāntavumāṇit
